pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

related.meaning: awal, titik awal, menggambar atau menerbitkan (draf)

lessons.japanese: 金をためるには出費を切りつめないと。
lessons.indonesian: We must cut our expenses to save money.

lessons.japanese: 我々は出費と収入の間で均衡をはかるべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: We should strike a balance between our expenditure and income.

lessons.japanese: もっと小さな家に移れば出費が切り詰められるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Moving to a smaller place will reduce the expenses.

lessons.japanese: その事業は政府に非常な出費をかけた。
lessons.indonesian: The undertaking entailed great expense upon the government.

lessons.japanese: その計画は会社に多額の出費を負わせるでしょう。
lessons.indonesian: The project will entail great expense upon the company.

lessons.japanese: 老齢人口は、健康管理にますます多くの出費が必要となるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: An aging population will require more spending on health care.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は出費に関わらず自分の計画を実行するだろう。
lessons.indonesian: She will carry out her plan, regardless of expense.

lessons.japanese: 彼の出費は収入をはるかに上回っている。
lessons.indonesian: His expenses exceed his income by far.

lessons.japanese: 車を持っていることは相当な出費だ。
lessons.indonesian: Keeping a car is a considerable expense.

lessons.japanese: 私達は月々の出費を削減しなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: We have to cut down our monthly expenses.

lessons.japanese: 今回の旅行での出費は全部つけておくつもりである。
lessons.indonesian: I'm going to keep track of all the expenses on this trip.

lessons.japanese: 金をためるには出費を切りつめないと。
lessons.indonesian: We must cut our expenses to save money.

lessons.japanese: 我々は出費と収入の間で均衡をはかるべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: We should strike a balance between our expenditure and income.

lessons.japanese: もっと小さな家に移れば出費が切り詰められるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Moving to a smaller place will reduce the expenses.

lessons.japanese: その事業は政府に非常な出費をかけた。
lessons.indonesian: The undertaking entailed great expense upon the government.
